original_text: They captured it that same day and put it to the sword and totally destroyed everyone in it, just as they had done to Lachish.
korean_text: 그 날에 그 성읍을 취하고 칼날로 그것을 쳐서 그 중에 있는 모든 사람을 당일에 진멸하여 바쳤으니 라기스에 행한 것과 같았더라

sentences.original_text: and put it to the sword
and totally destroyed everyone in it
sentences.korean_translation: 그 안의 모든 사람을 완전히 멸망시켰으니

sentences.original_text: just as they had done to Lachish
